attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
...abandon Vehicle Tracking and Related Taxation. Whilst the Innocent Civilian should have nothing to fear in Law, it is a Gross Intrusion of one's Privacy to Monitor and Know more of their Movements than the Persons Themselves can recall.
Fuel Tax is a Fair Proportional Charge on Road Usage and easy to Administrate.
More should be done now to execute realistic sentencing of offending drivers who blatently ignore Driving Qualifications, Road Tax and the all too frequent tragedies arising from Uninsured Vehicles!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
